siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Synthesize inputs and create original output
frontmatter.description: Generate new ideas by making connections others may not notice. Each individual's inputs are unique and shape outputs.

frontmatter.title: Listen to feedback shape future projects
frontmatter.description: Use feedback wisely. Learn to decipher what others are saying to help shape the course of future projects.

frontmatter.title: Identify problems, plan solutions
frontmatter.description: Don't overdo negative talk in any situation, even if it is a "realist" viewpoint. Find positive, keep talks upbeat with others.
